description: Factorial splitting: write n! = x*y with x<y and x maximal; sequence gives value of y.
comments: This sequence is essentially the same as A060777 (see the comments for A061055). - Nathaniel Johnston, Jun 25 2011
mathematica: Do[ With[ {k = Floor[ Sqrt[ x! ] ] - Do[ If[ Mod[ x!, Floor[ Sqrt[ x! ] ] - n ] == 0, Return[ n ] ], {n, 0, 10000000} ]}, Print[ {x, "! =", k, x!/k, x!/k - k} ] ], {x, 3, 22} ]
author: _Ed Pegg Jr_, May 28 2001
